author: Bel Trew, Bel Trew
title: Hezbollah launches its newest war, this time against coronavirus
description: Dismissing accusations it inadvertently brought the deadly virus to Lebanon, Hezbollah has rolled out a battle plan to tackle the spread of the disease
content:
Lebanons powerful Shiite militia and political organisation Hezbollah has during its 35-year existence fought against Israel, rival factions inside the country and Syrian rebels opposed to Bashar al-Assad.
Now the Iran-funded group says it is gearing up for … [+10634 chars]
